Posts.Content: I had my follow-up mamo. and ultrasound yesterday and was informed that a biopsy is needed. However, the first opening for a surgical consult is September 27. That's 12 more days of worry for me. My question is: Should I just wait, or go to some other town and find a surgeon who can see me sooner?
Posts.Title: Time Between Ultrasound and Biopsy
